title: caraNa smaraNamE
sahitya:
caraNa smaraNamE santatam tIrttiDum janana maraNa bhayamE malar vaLarumannai


anupallavi

  taruNamA mazhaiyenak-karuNai pozhindu daraNiyil uyya sanmArgamum kATTiDum


caraNam    sheida palakOTi pApam tuDaittu shei namakkabhaya karamum koDuttu
 pai nAgamadanil paDuttOnai aDuttu mei inba vIDu kiDaittiDa parindumE uraittiDum annaiyin
